title: Bug on Champion Update Schedule Page

embed.description: Champion Updates Why do we have updates? Can I have a refund for a updated champion? Upcoming Updates Previous Updates Champion Updates Why do we have updates? A champion update is a gr...

body: If you scroll down to Previous Updates and click on Jax, it brings you to this [random webpage](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1534325&page=1#post17779011).

replies.body: Hey thanks for the report!  Not sure why it's linked to that specifically, but I've passed it on to our Docs team to check it out.  Ty!
